skins.shipDescription: Cleveland-class light cruiser C Birmingham, Hull Number CL-62.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Birmingham, the eighth Cleveland-class light cruiser. Born during the war, I fought to its end alongside my many sisters and earned 9 battle stars. As a Knight of the Sea, my duty continues, and I will now fight for the sea's future.
skins.acquisition: Starting today, Cleveland-class light cruiser Birmingham is on active duty. I will not rest until the future of the sea is secure. Commander, grant me your guidance and support.
skins.login: Sortie preparations complete. Your orders, Commander?
skins.details: Someday I hope to see the sea return to its peaceful former state...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Princeton... please be okay. If I had fought harder back then, things wouldn't have...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Sometimes people ridicule me for being unlucky, but having survived that hellish battle, I feel quite lucky.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I feel at ease when I'm with Cleve and my sisters. I believe this is what's known as a "bond."
skins.secretaryTouch: What is it, Commander? Was that your sortie order?

skins.shipDescription: Good morning, Commander. Unfortunately, this bicycle only seats one person, but I could dismount and lead it along as we walk together.
skins.acquisition: Good morning, Commander. Unfortunately, this bicycle only seats one person, but I could dismount and lead it along as we walk together.
skins.login: Is it time to sortie? Please wait. I must park my ride somewhere first.
skins.details: A bicycle must be maintained regularly, so I asked U-47 for advice and help. One day I need to offer her a favor in return.
skins.secretaryIdle1: It seems the academy has no bicycling club... Perhaps I should petition to create one... Hmm...
skins.secretaryIdle2: A new dessert shop opened, and their specialty is ice cream...? ... C-Commander, do you mind if I leave for a moment?
skins.secretaryIdle3: U-47, how about we go on a bicycling trip the next time you're off duty?
skins.secretaryTouch: Bicycling is an excellent way to train the body. Prepare your bicycle and we can go for a ride, Commander.

skins.ENClientName: Fruitful Snow of an Auspicious Year
